name: MSCRMUpdateConfigurationRecords
description: Upserts a configuration entity records using lookup/value pairs in a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 environment
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: Reads a json array of lookup/value and upserts records target environment

inputs.name: entityName
inputs.label: Entity Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The entity logical name to upsert. (i.e. prefix_config)

inputs.name: lookupFieldName
inputs.label: Lookup Field Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the field used to lookup the record. (i.e. prefix_key)

inputs.name: valueFieldName
inputs.label: Value Field Names
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma-separated list of the names of the fields for upserting the values. (e.g.: prefix_value1,prefix_value2). At least one if required.

inputs.name: configurationRecordsJson
inputs.label: A json array of lookup/value pairs.
